description: Authentication for GitHub Copilot SDK access

token_renewal.implementation: AuthErrorHandler in LLM module handles SDK OnErrorOccurred
token_renewal.notes: Token renewal via SDK retry mechanism; failed renewal saves state and aborts

pre_flight_auth_check.implementation: ValidateAuthAsync helper in PhaseCommands; wired into spec/plan/build commands and RootCommandHandler (headless + interactive)
pre_flight_auth_check.notes: Calls IAuthService.ValidateAsync before workflow execution; gracefully skips when auth module not registered

no_credential_storage.implementation: CopilotAuthService delegates all storage to IGhCliAdapter/env vars

acceptance_criteria_tests.notes: Consolidated acceptance criteria tests with explicit AUTH-XX requirement code traceability
